snippet.title: Everhood 2 - Official Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2023
snippet.description:
Everhood 2, the sequel to 2021's rhythm combat RPG, has been announced for PC and Nintendo Switch. In Foreign Gnomes' upcoming title, you'll partake in musical battles, explore a psychedelic world, and of course, choose your soul color. Everhood 2 has no release window, but it can be wishlisted on Steam today!

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
